Version Manager 5.3/6.0 Folder Properties

Use the Properties dialog box (File | Properties) to view the number of files included and change the workfile location for a Serena ChangeMan Version Manager 5.3/6.0 folder.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Contains The number of files included in the project.
Workspace Settings Tab
Workfile Location The workfile location of the folder. Enter changes as necessary or click the Browse button to select a location.
Workspace Information The work environment settings assigned to the project or versioned file. If the workspace is public, the specified workfile location affects all Users who will access the project or file using the public workspace. If the workspace is private, the specified workfile location will not affect other Users.

See Also
